articles.title: Is the move to electric cars running out of power? - BBC.com
articles.description: There has been an unexpected slowdown in sales of electric cars. Could this be more than a blip?

articles.author: Billy Bambrough
articles.title: Leak Reveals An ETF Perfect Storm Could Be Heading Toward Bitcoin After $6 Trillion Fed Inflation Flip Unleashed A Crypto Price Boom - Forbes
articles.description: Ahead of the key inflation data, one bullish bitcoin investor predicted there's "$6 trillion in cash on the sidelines" that could power the bitcoin price to $150,000 this year—calling the latest bitcoin bull run "still early"...
articles.content:
05/16 update below. This post was originally published on May 15
BitcoinBitcoin
 has suddenly shot higher, climbing after the latest U.S. inflation data showed price pressure has resumed its downwa… [+4680 chars]

articles.author: Ryan McMorrow, Edward White
articles.title: Xi Jinping urged to respond with caution to Joe Biden's trade tariffs - Financial Times
articles.description: Beijing advisers call on China’s leader to hold ‘moral high ground’ as spat with US intensifies
articles.content: China trade experts are urging caution on Xi Jinping as he plots the best response to Joe Bidens tariffs on $18bn of Chinese imports, knowing that a tit-for-tat battle could hurt the slowing economy … [+5769 chars]

articles.author: Rishika Sadam
articles.title: Exclusive: UK tightens scrutiny of all Indian spice imports amid contamination allegations - Reuters India
articles.description: Britain's food watchdog has applied extra control measures on all spice imports from India, it said on Wednesday, becoming the first to ramp up scrutiny of all Indian spices after contamination allegations against two brands sparked concerns among global food…
